caption.p: (Color online) H adsorption on anatase (101) : (A) PDOS on the most important atoms (O 2 c ,O 3 c ,Ti 5 c , and Ti 6 c ) of the top layer by using AE–LCAO (HSE), (B) PDOS on the two top trilayers by using AE–LCAO (HSE), (C) DOS by using AE–LCAO (HSE), (D) PDOS on the two bottom trilayers by using AE–LCAO (HSE) (bulk-like region), (E) DOS comparison of AE–LCAO (B3LYP) and PP–PW (PBE+U), and (F) DOS comparison of AE–LCAO (HSE) and PP–PW (PBE+U).
